name: Havest Exchange
description: A full-stack MERN (Mongoose, Express, React, Node) app that users can seach for produce from fellow gardeners in their area with filters.

name: Perfect Lips
description: A full-stack MERN (Mongoose, Express, React, Node) app that reviews lipstick products and displays them.

name: Fitness

name: Rick and Morty Wiki
